author: davisp
msg: All JS tests can now be run from the command line using the cURL
adapter. In the future I would like to rework this and provide better
TAP output. For now, each test is a single TAP assert.

author: marvin
msg: Commit most of LUCY-72, making Charmonizer's symbol prefixing more coherent
and consistent with the Lucy core.

author: davisp
msg: In particular, the cURL bindings have been rewritten to be more useful
and easily applied in command line scripts.

author: davisp
msg: Move all C code to src/couchdb/priv
Shuffling bits around to conform to Erlang conventions.
